gridSubtitle.markdown: Highlight the faces behind your product!

subtitle.markdown: This reference application explores the simplicity with which you can build modern and high-performance websites using a Headless CMS. Currently, all onsite promotions, SEO, navigations, and content, are handled from within GraphCMS itself.

marketing.content: This is a banner just for the about page. Clicking it will take you to graphcms.com.
